    • Constructor Detail

      • ColumnWidget

        public ColumnWidget(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    boolean resizable,
                    boolean visible,
                    java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Integer> onResize)
        Creates a container widget with resizable width, containing other widgets in a vertical fashion.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of top-left corner
        y - y-coordinate of top-left corner
        width - initial width of column
        height - height of column, needs be at least 25
        name - text to put at the top of the column
        resizable - whether the column can be resized
        visible - whether there is a top label
        onResize - function called when column is resized

      • ColumnWidget

        public ColumnWidget(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    java.lang.String name)

    • Method Detail

      • addWidget

        public void addWidget(Widget w)
        Adds a widget to the bottom of the column. The widget only gets added if it's height can fit in the remaining space of the column. The width of the widget is rescaled to the width of the column.
        Parameters:
        w - widget to be added

      • resize

        private void resize(int w)
        Resizes the width of the column
        Parameters:
        w - new width, needs be at least 5.

      • handleMouseEvent

        public boolean handleMouseEvent(int id,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                int clickCount)
        Description copied from class: Widget
        Event handler for mouse events
        Overrides:
        handleMouseEvent in class Widget
        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the type of event. Can be MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED, MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED or MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED
        x - x-coordinate of mouse event
        y - y-coordinate of mouse event
        clickCount - amount of times clicked (e.g. 1 for normal press, 2 for double-click, ...)

                              int keyCode,
                              char keyChar)
        Description copied from class: Widget
        Event handler for keyboard events
        Overrides:
        handleKeyEvent in class Widget
        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the type of event. Can be either KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED or KeyEvent.Key_TYPED
        keyCode - code of the key
        keyChar - char of the key

      • isBlocking

        public boolean isBlocking()
        Description copied from class: Widget
        Returns whether the widget is blocking. If a widget blocks, no new mouse events get handled.
        Overrides:
        isBlocking in class Widget
